subject: docs(guide): add tags vs properties decision guide
body:
AI authors and users had no guidance on when to use tags (labels) vs
properties for item metadata. This led to inconsistent tagging, which
degrades import matching quality since tags are used for disambiguation.

Added a "Tags vs properties" section with:
- Clear distinction: tags = "what kind of thing" / properties = "facts about it"
- Decision rule: filter by it → tag, read it on detail card → property
- 10 concrete examples (Person, CEO, revenue, founded, etc.)
- Three tiebreaker rules for ambiguous cases

Tags: docs, guide, conventions
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: import-compatibility
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GmBxqTbwGYpy2GUF4TGDLk
title: add tags vs properties decision guide
